articles.title: Conservative Supreme Court majority gets another crack at the Voting Rights Act
articles.description: The Supreme Court is poised on Tuesday to hear a case that supporters of voting rights fear will lead the court's new conservative majority to weaken a key provision of the Voting Rights Act that prohibits laws that result in racial discrimination.
